description.value: Your quantum field merges with a more dangerous reality, becoming hazardous terrain that deals 1 damage to an enemy each time it enters a square in the area. You choose the damage type when you use Danger Zone, selecting from the following: @Damage[(max(1,(floor(@actor.level / 4) - 1)))[acid]|options:area-damage]{acid}, @Damage[(max(1,(floor(@actor.level / 4) - 1)))[bludgeoning]|options:area-damage]{bludgeoning}, @Damage[(max(1,(floor(@actor.level / 4) - 1)))[cold]|options:area-damage]{cold}, @Damage[(max(1,(floor(@actor.level / 4) - 1)))[electricity]|options:area-damage]{electricity}, @Damage[(max(1,(floor(@actor.level / 4) - 1)))[fire]|options:area-damage]{fire}, @Damage[(max(1,(floor(@actor.level / 4) - 1)))[piercing]|options:area-damage]{piercing}, @Damage[(max(1,(floor(@actor.level / 4) - 1)))[slashing]|options:area-damage]{slashing}, or @Damage[(max(1,(floor(@actor.level / 4) - 1)))[sonic]|options:area-damage]{sonic}. Increase the damage by 1 at 12th, 16th, and 20th levels.
